definition: to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: A clear conscience is a soft pillow.
This recumbent had established the acting industry company that enjoy the cool greatly, as before cannot have nothing worry about.
sentences.chinese: 这个靠着大树好乘凉的代工企业，依旧不能高枕无忧。

sentences.english: Will having a degree insulate you from getting laid off?
sentences.chinese: 是否有了学位就能让你高枕无忧，远离裁员呢？

sentences.english: But he was quickly assured that he could rest easy.
sentences.chinese: 但他很快就放心，他可以高枕无忧。

sentences.english: And I'll get to sleep at night.
sentences.chinese: 我这下子可以高枕无忧了。

sentences.english: But President Hu Jintao will still be worrying.
sentences.chinese: 但是胡主席远没有因此而高枕无忧。

definition: everything is fine (idiom); all is well with the world
to get sth done once and for all
imminent/just around the corner (idiom)
grasp it and victory is assured/to have success within one's grasp (idiom)
to reap where one has not sown (idiom)
to be gravely mistaken (idiom)
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
to do whatever one pleases
surefire; absolutely safe (idiom)
benefit from others' dispute (idiom)
safe and secure
easily obtained/readily available
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
provided that/supposing that/if
attempting nothing and accomplishing nothing (idiom); without any initiative or drive/feckless
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
